
snap(0,0,0)

sky(210,255,255)
fog(210,255,255)
ground(225,205,150)
polys(180,205,150)

fadefrom(13865)

name(Nuclear WASTEland)

nlaps(20)

set(47,0,0,250,0)
set(15,0,0,250,0)p
set(33,0,1100,250,0)
set(15,0,5600,250,0)p
set(15,0,11200,250,0)p
set(15,0,16800,250,0)p
chk(42,0,16800,250,0)
set(17,0,21000,250,-90)pt
set(15,-4500,21000,250,90)p
set(15,-10000,21000,250,90)p
chk(42,-10000,21000,250,90)
set(17,-14500,21000,250,90)pt
set(20,-14500,25500,250,0)po
set(10,-14500,30500,250,0)p
set(10,-14500,35500,250,0)p
.set(53,-15000,34000,250,90)
.set(53,-14000,34000,250,90)
set(45,-14500,35500,250,0)pr
set(46,-14500,38500,250,0)
set(46,-14500,42000,250,0)
set(45,-14500,46000,250,180)

.fix(41,-14500,35500,250,180)s
set(10,-14500,40500,250,0)p
set(10,-14500,45500,250,0)p
set(10,-14500,50500,250,0)p
chk(40,-14500,50500,250,0)
set(14,-14500,54500,250,0)pt
set(20,-10500,54500,250,90)p
set(44,-5000,54500,250,90)p
set(35,-3000,54500,250,90)pr
set(43,0,54500,250,90)p
set(43,5500,54500,250,90)p


maxt(1,58000,0)
maxb(1,-58000,0)
maxr(1,58000,0)
maxl(1,-58000,0)
